title: Can I configure more than one email account on my MediaPad T1?
answer:
Yes. 

 If you have not configured any email accounts, touch Email, and follow the onscreen instructions. 

If you have already configured an email account, touch Email > Menu > Settings > Add account, and follow the onscreen instructions.  

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430154843606001.png)
